summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5268 for the improvement of 19th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 80th Street by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 60904, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
